name: Outer Shell
description:
This is a short demo. I was unable to finish half the rooms and two enemies. The boss is in a barely playable state as well, only having one type of attack.

Nonetheless, I hope you enjoy it.

The controls are:

Space: Jump

M: Map

P / Esc: Pause

Power Ups:

J /Left Mouse: Attack

K / Right Mouse: Block (You can hold it forever. But you cannot block attacks while attacking)

You can parry while your character is flashing white as soon as you press the block key, otherwise, you will just block.

Everything in this game except for the sound effects and fonts were made by me in the following:

Engine: Godot

Music: Apple GarageBand

Sprites: Aseprite

The font pack used is Humble Font Free created by Eeve Somepx

The sound effects were provided courtesy of ZatSplat and edited using Audacity
